Trigger.Description: If the origin of a successful Strike with an automatic weapon has the action hero fighting style, the target becomes suppressed until the start of the origin's next turn.

When a combatant starts their turn within the kinetic aura of an air gate kineticist with its aura junction, grant that character the corresponding bonus to their Speeds via effect until the end of their turn.

This benefit overlaps with the system's effect when inside the aura, but persists once the character leaves the aura until the end of their turn.
When the origin of an attack with an aldori dueling sword has the Aldori Swordlord feat, add its corresponding effect to them, according to their degree of success.
When a target takes damage and they have Amulet's Abeyance's resistance effect, remove that effect.
When a combatant with Aura of Courage ends their turn, all allies within their aura reduce their frightened condition by 1.

When a combatant starts their turn within a Shining Child's Blinding Aura, send that ability to chat. When a roller fails their saving throw against Blinding Aura, add the blinded condition according to their degree of success. On a critical success, the roller does not trigger further Blinding Aura triggers.
WWhen a target takes damage from an origin with the Brutal Beating feat, that target becomes frightened 1.

When a target takes damage and they have a Champion's Resistance effect, remove that effect.

If the effect origin has Glimpse of Redemption, the damage origin also becomes enfeebled until the end of its next turn. If they have the Weight of Guilt feat, the champion can choose whether to apply the stupefied or enfeebled conditions.

AwaitConfirmation.Prompt: Will you use Weight of Guilt to make the enemy stupefied rather than enfeebled?
AwaitConfirmation.Title: Weight of Guilt

AuraEntered.Description: When a character enters a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-monster-core.Actor.Ccjg08wVRO43YlTf]{Jann}'s Commanding Presence, send that ability to chat and add an immunity effect to the triggering character. If that character is a non-jann genie, also add an auxiliary effect with a penalty to their save.

Description.Bow: When critical damage is dealt with a weapon in the bow group and the origin has its critical specialization effect, add the immobilized condition to the target.
Description.Spear: When critical damage is dealt with a weapon in the spear group and the origin has its critical specialization effect, add the clumsy condition to the target until the start of the origin's turn. If the weapon has the grievous rune, the effect lasts for an additional round.
Description.Sword: When critical damage is dealt with a weapon in the sword group and the origin has its critical specialization effect, add the off-guard condition to the target until the start of the origin's turn. If the weapon has the grievous rune, the effect lasts until the end of the origin's turn instead.

Trigger.Description: When a target enters a kinetic aura, or starts their turn within one, and the source of that aura is in Crowned in Tempest's Fury stance, roll 2d12 electricity damage against that target.
When the origin of an attack critically hits and their weapon has a crushing or greater crushing rune, their target becomes clumsy and enfeebled.

When a combatant is created and they have an active Defend exploration activity, add an effect that raises their shield.

At the start of a combatant's first turn in a combat, remove that effect.

When the roller of a skill check to Demoralize a target succeeds on their check, add the frightened 1 condition to the target (frightened 2 on a critical success). Regardless of the outcome, the target gains an immunity tracking effect.

AuraEntered.Description:
When a character enters a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wjJW9hWY5CkkMvY5]{Diamond Dust} aura, roll its damage and add an effect to make the character immune to further instances of this trigger.

For this trigger to work, the spellcaster must have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-trigger-trove.auxiliary-items.Item.fyKmMJganeNRIVWi]{Aux Effect: Diamond Dust} applied to them, dragged from the spell when posted to chat. Link this effect in the spell's description.

TurnEnded.Description:
When a character ends their turn inside a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wjJW9hWY5CkkMvY5]{Diamond Dust} aura, roll its damage. If a character has the immunity effect added by the Aura Entered trigger, remove that effect.

For this trigger to work, the spellcaster must have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-trigger-trove.auxiliary-items.Item.fyKmMJganeNRIVWi]{Aux Effect: Diamond Dust} applied to them, dragged from the spell when posted to chat. Link this effect in the spell's description.

Trigger.Description: When a roller succeeds on their skill check to Disarm a target, add Disarm's success effect to that target. On a critical failure, the roller becomes off-guard until the start of their next turn.

When the origin of an attack has Distracting Shot and critically hits their hunted prey, or if they hit their hunted prey twice in the same turn, that target becomes off-guard until the start of the origin's next turn.

If the origin has Greater Distracting Shot, this effect lasts until the end of their next turn instead. Additionally, their hunted prey becomes off-guard until the start of their next turn on a single hit.

TurnEnded.Description: When a non-immune living character ends their turn in a Dread Flickering aura, send the ability to chat alongside an immunity auxiliary effect to be applied in the event of a critically successful save.

Trigger.Description: When an attack critically misses against a target benefitting from Elegant Buckler, that target gains panache until the end of their next turn.
When a target takes damage and they have Enduring Might's resistance effect, remove that effect.

When a combatant with Energy Shot is created, confirm whether the free action will be used. If so, add its auxiliary effect to the combatant, which will keep track of their shots used with a Special Resource.

If the origin of an attack rolled with a crossbow or firearm has the Energy Shot auxiliary effect, deplete the energy resource by 1. If the Energy Shot resource is at zero, remove the effect.
Trigger.Prompt: Are you using Energy Shot in this combat?

Trigger.Description: When a creature that is Engulfed or Swallowed Whole ends their turn, roll that ability's damage.
When an attack misses against a target benefitting from Extravagant Parry, that target gains panache until the end of their next turn.
When the origin of an attack critically hits and their weapon has a fearsome or greater fearsome rune, add the frightened 1 or 2 condition to the target, respectively.
When a target is brought to 0 Hit Points by a finisher from an origin with Finishing Follow-Through, that origin gains panache.

DamageTaken.Description: Remove @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.y7Tusv3CieZktkkV]{Flame Barrier}'s effect when damage is taken.

Trigger.Description: When an attack misses against a target benefitting from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.TnYHtN9gQASqOnii]{Flashy Dodge}, that target gains panache until the end of their next turn.

Trigger.CreateChatMessage: Trigger Trove Note On a success, this critical hit becomes a normal hit thanks to your fortification rune!
Trigger.Description:
When the target of a critically successful attack is wearing armor with a fortification or greater fortification rune etched onto it is critically hit, roll a flat check with the appropriate DC.

This is skipped if the character has the Perfect Protection feat, deferring to the system's automation instead.

Description.All: Post the Frightful Presence ability to chat when a creature enters the aura. If you have Frightful Presence (Aura Entered, Enemies Only) enabled, disable this one.
Description.EnemiesOnly: Post the Frightful Presence ability to chat when an enemy of the Frightful Presence creature enters the aura. If you have Frightful Presence (Aura Entered) enabled, disable this one.

TurnStarted.Description: When a non-immune creature begins its turn within the gibbering aura, send the ability to chat alongside an auxiliary effect to apply immunity.

Trigger.Description: When a roller succeeds on their skill check to Grapple a target, that target becomes grabbed. On a critical success, the target becomes restrained instead.

DamageTaken.Description: Roll persistent fire damage each time a creature within an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.AspA30tzKCHFWRf0]{Incendiary Aura} takes damage. This trigger cannot distinguish between damage types, so it's up to the user to apply it only when the triggering creature takes fire damage.
DamageTaken.Note: If a creature within the emanation takes fire damage, it catches on fire, taking persistent fire damage.

Trigger.Description: When a combatant enters or starts their turn within an intense heat aura, roll its damage and post a saving throw against it.
When the target of a successful attack has Inviolable, roll 3d6 spirit damage. If they are holy or unholy, the damage has the corresponding trait.

If a target takes damage from an enemy origin with Martial Performance, and the origin is under the effects of courageous anthem, rallying anthem, or song of strength; extend the duration of these effects by 1 round. Then, add an effect that prevents effects from benefitting more than once.

For this trigger to work correctly, the composition effect must have been dragged from the triggering character's chat card.

AttackRolled.Description:
If the attacked creature has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-trigger-trove.auxiliary-items.Item.pnSHABS9FZvExLa9]{Aux Effect: Mirror Image}, automatically reduce the Mirror Images resource depending on both the outcome of the attack and a randomly generated number, as described by the spell.

It's recommended that the auxiliary effect is added to the spell's description for easy access, and used instead of the system-provided effect.

Note.Hit: Mirror Image The attack hits you! All your mirror images remain.
Note.Miss: Mirror Image The attack misses you! One of your mirror images is destroyed.

AttackRolled.Description:
Reduce the duration of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.2BV2yYPfVJ5zirZt]{Mountain Resilience}'s effect by 1 minute each time the beneficiary of the spell is hit by an attack that deals bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage.

Note: Due to a current limitation, this trigger will only work when the primary damage type is bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing. This covers most cases, but be aware that some instances of the previously mentioned damage types will be missed.

Roll @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.BA143r8fCqmSjdRf]{Nettleskin}'s damage when the recipient of the spell is hit with an unarmed attack, or a melee attack by an adjacent attacker.

For this trigger to work, the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-trigger-trove.auxiliary-items.Item.QrCwY1ylvvuzW7mb]{Aux Effect: Nettleskin} must be dragged onto the recipient. Furthermore, it must be dragged from the spell's card in chat, otherwise it won't have the correct scaling.

Trigger.Description: When a combatant with One Shot, One Kill is created, confirm whether they will use it as a free action. If so, add an effect that enables its additional precision damage until their first successful Strike deals damage, and then remove the effect.
Trigger.Prompt: Are you using One Shot, One Kill in this combat?

Trigger.Description: If a Crafting check to Overdrive is rolled, add the appropriate effect to the roller based on their degree of success. On a critical failure, add an effect to keep track of their malfunctioning gadgets, rolling 1d4 to determine its duration.

When the roller of a check has the Panache class feature and is using a bravado action, add panache to them as appropriate for their degree of success.

When the origin of an attack uses a finisher, remove panache from them once the attack's damage, if any, is resolved.

DamageTaken.Description: Automatically remove @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rMOI8JFJ0nT2mrCF]{Phase Familiar}'s effect after damage is taken
Automatically remove @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.6sNjsNPipZvQ3BGe]{Rapid Retreat}'s effect after damage is taken.

Trigger.Description: When a combatant starts its turn inside a kinetic aura whose source is in Ravel of Thorns stance, add an effect to that combatant to apply the corresponding speed penalty. Remove this effect when they leave the kinetic aura.

TurnEnded.Description: When a character with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.3eRkOQa7h1MWmzBh]{Initiate Benefit (Regalia)} ends their turn, reduce the frightened value of all frightened allies within their inspiring aura by 1.

Trigger.Description: When the target of a lay on hands spell is healed by the spell and its origin has the Rejuvenating Touch feat, that target receives its temporary Hit Points.

When a target takes damage from an origin with Replenishment of War, and that damage comes from a Strike with their deity's favored weapon, grant Replenishment of War's temporary Hit Points to the origin, as appropriate for the outcome of Strike. If the damage origin has Shared Replenishment, this trigger will have no effect.

When the origin of a successful attack is using Revitalizing Finisher, the origin creature and all allies within 30 feet of it gain temporary Hit Points equal to half the origin's level. On a failure, only the origin gains this benefit.

DescriptionOverride.Basic: The attack target becomes immobilized ([[/act escape dc=23]]) and clumsy 1 for as long as the immobilization lasts.
DescriptionOverride.Greater: The attack target becomes immobilized ([[/act escape dc=28]]) and clumsy 1 for as long as the immobilization lasts.
DescriptionOverride.Major: The attack target becomes immobilized ([[/act escape dc=34]]) and clumsy 1 for as long as the immobilization lasts.
DescriptionOverride.True: The attack target becomes immobilized ([[/act escape dc=41]]) and clumsy 1 for as long as the immobilization lasts.

Trigger.Description: When the origin of a critically successful attack uses a weapon with a rooting rune, add the clumsy and immobilized conditions to the target.

SafeElements.Addendum: A target with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-trigger-trove.auxiliary-items.Item.p4SCBtIYPzVQ0gEd]{Aux Effect: Safe Elements} dragged onto them from the kineticist's sheet. is unaffected by this trigger.

AwaitConfirmation.Prompt: An opponent critically hits you with an attack that deals physical damage. Will you use Scars of Steel?

Trigger.Description:
When a target that is Raging is critically hit by an attack that deals physical damage, and that target has Scars of Steel with available uses left, confirm whether they will use the ability. If so, add an auxiliary effect that enables its resistance, and deplete one use from Scars of Steel.

Once damage is taken, remove the previously added effect.
When a combatant that has an active Scout activity is created, add its effect to all allied tokens in the scene.
When a Scouting combatant with Scout Dedication is created, add an effect that upgrades Scout's bonus for all allies benefitting from it.

AwaitConfirmation.Prompt: Will you use Scout's Warning? You must roll a Perception, Stealth, or Survival check for initiative.

Trigger.Description: When a combatant with Scout's Warning is created, confirm whether they will use it as a free action. If so, add Scout's Warning effect to the combatant and their allies.

When a target with Selfish Shield's effect takes damage, remove that effect and add an effect to the target for Selfish's Shield additional damage, reminding the user to target the origin of the damage. If the damage target has Ongoing Selfishness, add its effect as well.
Trigger.Note: Trigger Trove Note An effect for Selfish Shield's extra damage has been added! Target the source of the damage to activate it.

Trigger.ChatMessage:
Trigger Trove Note Drag this effect onto the designated ally for Shared Stratagem!

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-trigger-trove.auxiliary-items.Item.u6Czd41XiuFK70J3]{Aux Effect: Shared Stratagem}
Trigger.Description:
When an attacker with Shared Stratagem successfully attacks their Devise a Stratagem target, and that target isn't being affected by Shared Stratagem already, add a trigger effect marking said target as such, and post a chat message containing an auxiliary effect an ally may drag onto themselves to benefit from Shared Stratagem.

When an attacker holding the aforementioned auxiliary effect targets the investigator's marked target, that target will be off-guard to that attack.

Note: This trigger may behave incorrectly if you have more than one character using Shared Stratagem to help each other.

AttackRolled.Description:
Roll @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ZL97DcoJ8us6EwAF]{Shields of the Spirit}'s damage when an ally is attacked while they are in the champion's aura. The champion must have the spell's effect on them.

Alternatively, roll damage if the target ally is not within the champion's aura, but does have the Shields of the Spirit (Security) effect on them.

Trigger.Description: When a target under the effects of Spike Skin takes damage from an unarmed attack or a non-reach melee weapon, roll Spike Skin's damage. Additionally, if the damage the target takes is physical, regardless of its source, the duration of Spike Skin is reduced by 1 minute.

TurnStarted.Description:
When a creature starts their turn and they have a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.yHujiDQPdtXW797e]{Spirit Link} auxiliary effect that originated from themselves, then check scene tokens for other creatures with an identical effect. If there is such a creature, check if they're not at their Hit Point maximum and if so, send a damage-healing-hybrid roll to chat for both parties of spirit link to apply to themselves.

For this trigger to work properly, you must add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-trigger-trove.auxiliary-items.Item.rn7KiPMH6u7C6mUD]{Aux Effect: Spirit Link} to the spell's description and drag it from the spell's chat card to both the spellcaster and the target.
TurnStarted.Note: At the start of each of your turns, if the target is below maximum Hit Points, it regains 2 Hit Points per spell rank of spirit link (or the difference between its current and maximum Hit Points, if that's lower). You lose as many Hit Points as the target regained.

Trigger.Description: When the origin of an attack is using Staggering Fire, and their attack hits or critically using a weapon in the bow group, the target receives the appropriate speed penalty.

If a combatant in Steam Knight stance starts their turn and there's at least one enemy in their kinetic aura, roll Steam Knight's damage, including a reminder note of the free action they can use to deal this damage, and the necessary saving throw.
Trigger.Note: Steam Knight F At the start of each of your turns, you can emit steam as a free action. It deals fire damage to each creature in your kinetic aura with a @Check[reflex|against:kineticist|basic|options:area-effect,forced-movement] save. A creature that fails is also pushed 5 feet.

AuraEntered.Description: Post the Stench ability when a creature enters the aura.

TurnStarted.Description: Post the Stench ability when a creature starts its turn in the aura.

Trigger.Description: When a roller fails their saving throw against an origin using an area weapon with the suppressing fire class feature, the roller becomes suppressed until the start of the origin's next turn.

AwaitConfirmation.Prompt: Will you use Swaggering Initiative in this encounter?

Trigger.Description: When a combatant with the Swaggering Initiative feat is created, confirm whether they will use that feat. If so, toggle their bonus to initiative on. If that combatant is the first one to act, they gain panache.

AttackRolled.Description: Remove Panache's effect when a finisher misses. If the attack is rerolled into a success, grant Panache back to enable finisher damage.

DamageTaken.Description: Remove Panache's effect from damage origin when finisher damage is dealt.

Trigger.Description:
When the origin of a successful ranged Strike with a one-handed firearm or crossbow has the Sword and Pistol feat, and the target is an enemy within their reach—as indicated by the Sword and Pistol toggle in their sheet—add an auxiliary effect that makes the target off-guard to the origin's next melee attack with a one-handed melee weapon. Add a trigger effect to the target of this attack for tracking purposes as well.

When a target that was off-guard as a result of Sword and Pistol takes damage from a character with that feat using a one-handed melee weapon, remove the auxiliary effect on the attacker, and the trigger effect on the target.
When the origin of an attack is Taunted, and the target is not the origin of that Taunt, the origin becomes off-guard until the start of its next turn.
When a combatant starts their turn within, or enters, a kinetic aura whose source is in Thermal Nimbus stance, roll the corresponding damage.
When a target receives healing from Treat Wounds, remove the wounded condition and, if the character doesn't have Continual Recovery, add its immunity tracking effect.

Item.Note: A damaging effect that affects all targets within your space destroys all of the mirrors.

AttackRolled.Description:
If the attacked creature has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-trigger-trove.auxiliary-items.Item.SlgTXSJRSL5UplfQ]{Aux Effect: Trickster's Mirrors}, automatically reduce the Trickster's Mirrors resource depending on both the outcome of the attack and a randomly generated number, as described by the spell. If the attacker is within 5 feet, roll damage when a mirror is destroyed.

It's recommended that the auxiliary effect is added to the spell's description for easy access.

Note.Hit: Trickster's Mirror The attack hits you! All your mirrors remain.
Note.Miss: The attack misses you! One of your mirrors is destroyed. If the attacker was within 5 feet, they must succeed at a @Check[will|basic|options:item:type:spell|traits:animist,focus,illusion,mental,visual] save or take mental damage as they believe themselves cut by a shower of glass shards from the breaking mirror.
Note.MissNoDamage: Trickster's Mirror The attack misses you! One of your mirrors is destroyed.

Trigger.Description: When a roller succeeds on their skill check to Trip a target, add the prone condition prone to the target. Additionally, roll Trip's damage on a critical success. On a critical failure, add the trip condition to the roller instead.
When a target takes damage from a critical hit from an origin with Unbalancing Blow, that target becomes off-guard against the origin's attacks until the end of their next turn.
When a target takes damage from an origin using Unbalancing Finisher, that target is off-guard until the end of the origin's next turn.

Item.Addendum: Anytime you cast a vitality spell, the thorns' damage increases to d6s of piercing damage until the start of your next turn.

AttackRolled.Description: Roll @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.nnSipUPNd3sm5vYL]{Vibrant Thorns}' damage when the recipient of the spell is hit with an unarmed attack, or a melee attack by an adjacent creature.

Macro.DepletedVitalityNetwork: {actor} has no Hit Points left in their vitality network.
Macro.Hint: The number of Hit Points you will transfer
Macro.Label: Transfer Vitality
Macro.Select: Select a token with a vitality network
Macro.Target: Select a target for Transfer Vitality

Trigger.Description:
When a combatant with Transfer Vitality starts their turn, their vitality network regains Hit Points.

When a token with vitality network is selected and you run the Vitality Network macro, you can select a number of Hit Points to roll as healing and reduce from your vitality network.

When the origin of a critically successful attack uses a weapon with a vitalizing rune, add the enfeebled 1 condition to the target. Additionally, add the stupefied 1 condition if the rune was a greater vitalizing rune

AttackRolled.Description:
If a character affected by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.D4kArD91fFiREvC6]{Warning Stripes}, as determined by the presence of its auxiliary effect, is hit with a melee unarmed attack, roll the spell's damage.

For this trigger to work, the spell recipient needs @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-trigger-trove.auxiliary-items.Item.0qQV2XvX2kaOt8yj]{Aux Effect: Warning Stripes} applied to them. This effect must be linked in the spell's description for ease of access and to set the correct origin data on it.

DamageTaken.Description: Automatically remove @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.UtINSoEJ0u630ia4]{Warping Pull}'s effect after damage is taken
